entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's face is described as having cold fury in every line, and a sense of power radiating from him.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is unconscious and his face is visible after being kicked over by Dumbledore.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is looking into the Foe-Glass, where his own face is still visible.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall goes straight to Harry and whispers to him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being spoken to by McGonagall.

relationships.description: Dumbledore kicks Moody over onto his back.
Snape is looking into the Foe-Glass.
